Text: The Plants were a doo wop quartet, based out of Baltimore, Maryland and formed in 1955.
Triplets:<The Plants
1:
--------------------
Text: The Plants:  James Lawson (baritone), Thuman Thrower (bass), Steve McDowell (first tenor) and George Jackson (lead) constituted the original line-up, who were known as The Equadors.

<James Lawson
2:
--------------------
Text: The Plants:  They got their break from Zell Sanders, owner of J&S Records, performing for her backstage at the Royal Theatre during a concert by The Moonglows.
